job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting,Human Resources
job.description: At John Deere we run so life can leap forward This powerful purpose is our promise to humankind that we will dream design and deliver breakthrough products that sustain our world for generations to come The world is counting on us to feed billions of people and build vital infrastructures in villages towns and megacities We live up to the legacy our founder forged in a oneroom blacksmiths shop nearly two centuries ago by creating a culture that brings out the best in all of us A culture where great ideas thrive because every voice is heardbrbrstrongPrimary Locationstrong United States US  Iowa  UrbandalebrbrstrongFunctionstrong Data Science amp AnalyticsbrbrstrongTitle strongData Scientist  76123brbrstronguYour ResponsibilitiesbrbrustrongThis position qualifies for a partial telework or flexible work arrangementbrbrAs a strongData Scientist strongfor ISG John Deere located in Urbandale IA you willbrulli Establish and maintain core quality engineering datasets and dashboards that promote our collective understanding of key business measures such as Failures per Machine FPM Problem Resolution Cycle Time PRCT supplier quality performance and supplier delivery performance lili Participate as an active member of our EndtoEnd Solution Acceptability and Reliability ESAR core team innovating new ways to measure the customer quality experience of tech stack solutions through telematics lili Perform adhoc data analysis for significant quality events that support rigorous root cause analysis and preventative actions lili Lead the ISG Quality teams trials in machine learning For example experiment with training a machine learning engine to categorize failure modes of warranty claims brliulstrong This position is open to sponsorship brbrstrongstronguWhat Skills You Needbrustrongulli 1 or more years of experience in data wrangling structuring cleaning validating and publishing data lili 1 or more years of experience in a data analytics field developing models lili 1 or more years of experience programming in SQL R Python or Spark brliulstronguWhat Makes You Stand Outbrustrongulli Experience with tools such as S3 Cloud applications SAS tools for analytics Databricks Power Apps Tableau R Shiny lili Practice in advanced data gathering and statistical analysis lili Experience with quality related datasets eg warranty reliability yield nonconformance and corrective action downtimeuptime DTAC machine health lili Experience with ISG hardware and software products brliulstrongEducationbrbrstrongIdeally you will have a degree or equivalent related work experience in the followingbrulli Degree in a Math Engineering Economics Analytics or Statistics discipline or equivalent experience University Degree brliulustrongWhat Youll GetbrbrstronguAt John Deere you are empowered to create a career that will take you to where you want to go Here youll enjoy the freedom to explore new projects the support to think outside the box and the advanced tools and technology that foster innovation and achievement We offer comprehensive relocation and reward packages to help you get started on your new career path Click here to find out more about our Total Rewards PackagebrbrThe information contained herein is not intended to be an exhaustive list of all responsibilities and qualifications required of individuals performing the job The qualifications detailed in this job description are not considered the minimum requirements necessary to perform the job but rather as guidelinesbrbrAn Equal Opportunity Employer John Deere requires a diversity of people perspectives and ideas to address the complex challenges of its global business John Deere is an equal opportunity employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to among other things race religion color national origin sex age sexual orientation gender identity status as a protected veteran or status as a qualified individual with disability
